trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface that enable users to change their Web site password.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者介面，可讓使用者變更他們的網站密碼。

trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.target: [簡介](#Introduction)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control on a page to enable your Web site users to change the passwords they use to log on to your Web site.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>讓網站使用者變更密碼來登入您的網站使用的頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中可用的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能繼續。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd).
trans-unit.target: 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。

trans-unit.source: Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users.
trans-unit.target: 可以檢視或遭惡意使用者 HTTP 傳輸。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback.
trans-unit.target: 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control uses the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property to change the password stored in the membership provider data store for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制使用中定義的成員資格提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>變更密碼儲存在網站上的成員資格提供者資料存放區中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not assign a membership provider, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control uses the default membership provider defined in the section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有指派成員資格提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項使用 Web.config 檔案的區段中定義的預設成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control enables users to perform the following actions:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項可讓使用者執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Change their password if they are logged on.
trans-unit.target: 如果登入，請變更其密碼。

trans-unit.source: Change their password if they are not logged on, as long as the page that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control allows anonymous access and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 變更其密碼，如果您未登入，只要此頁面包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項可讓匿名存取和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Change the password for a user account, even if they are logged on as a different user.
trans-unit.target: 變更使用者帳戶的密碼，即使不同的使用者身分登入。

trans-unit.source: This requires the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這需要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` displays the User Name text box, which allows the user to type in a user name.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>屬性`true`會顯示 使用者名稱文字方塊中，可讓使用者輸入的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the user is logged on, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> control is populated with the name of the logged-on user.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者登入，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>控制項填入登入使用者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: After the password for the given user name is changed, the user is logged on to the account associated with the changed password, even if the user was not logged on to that account previously.
trans-unit.target: 指定的使用者名稱的密碼變更後，使用者被登入相關聯變更密碼的帳戶即使使用者先前未曾登入帳戶。

trans-unit.source: Accepting user input is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 接受使用者輸入可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords.
trans-unit.target: 惡意使用者可以傳送資料，目的是要公開的弱點可能會或執行程式，嘗試產生的密碼。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control.
trans-unit.target: 為了提高安全性，處理使用者輸入時，您應該使用您的控制項的驗證功能，並保護您的控制項設定的任何資料提供者。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)，[的 Web 應用程式的基本安全性作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，和[保護的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。

trans-unit.source: Sending Email Messages
trans-unit.target: 傳送電子郵件訊息

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control can be configured to use email services to send the new password to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項可以設定要傳送給使用者的新密碼時，用於電子郵件服務。

trans-unit.source: To send email messages to users from any of ASP.NET Web server controls, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application.
trans-unit.target: 從 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項的任何傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息，您必須在 Web.config 檔案中設定電子郵件伺服器應用程式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 安裝及設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。

trans-unit.source: Email messages are configured using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用設定電子郵件訊息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>類別。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> property to instruct ASP.NET to send email.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>屬性，指示傳送電子郵件的 ASP.NET。

trans-unit.source: Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications.
trans-unit.target: 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可以讀取由特殊 「 探查 」 應用程式的網路。

trans-unit.source: To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c).
trans-unit.target: 為了提高安全性，請使用如下所述的防護功能[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會接收使用者，或檢視電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: To verify that a user has received a message, provide a confirmation link in the email message that lets the user confirm that the notification was received.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認使用者已收到的訊息，提供可讓使用者確認收到通知的電子郵件訊息中有個確認連結。

trans-unit.source: Views
trans-unit.target: 檢視

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control has two states, or views:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項有兩個狀態或檢視表：

trans-unit.source: Change Password view Requests the current password, and requires the user to type the new password twice for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼 檢視要求目前的密碼，並要求使用者輸入新密碼兩次進行確認。

trans-unit.source: If you allow users who are not logged on to change their passwords, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> control in Change Password view.
trans-unit.target: 如果您允許使用者變更其密碼，請設定未登入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>屬性`true`顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>變更密碼 檢視中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> control allows the user to provide their registered user name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>控制項可讓使用者提供他們的已註冊的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If there is an error when changing the password, an error message is displayed in the Change Password view, allowing the user to try again.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更的密碼時，沒有錯誤，錯誤訊息會顯示在 [變更密碼] 檢視中，允許使用者以再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Success view Provides confirmation that the password has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 順利完成檢視表提供確認的密碼已經變更。

trans-unit.source: The functionality for changing passwords and for continue and cancel is attached to any button that has the correct command name, regardless of which view the button is placed on.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼，並繼續 和 取消 5d; 的功能被附加到任何有正確的命令名稱，不論哪個檢視放置按鈕的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: For example, a button with the value `commandname=changepassword` in the Success view will attempt to change the password and result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值的按鈕`commandname=changepassword`成功檢視會嘗試變更密碼，而導致例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Styles and Templates
trans-unit.target: 樣式和範本

trans-unit.source: You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用一組廣泛的樣式屬性來自訂外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the two views if you need complete control over the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以自訂將範本套用至兩個檢視如果您需要完成的外觀控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you define a template for a view, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> properties are applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果您定義的範本 檢視中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性會套用。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the controls that you must set in the view templates, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如需檢視範本中，您必須設定控制項的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control examines the content in the template and throws an exception if a required control is not found, is not named correctly, or is of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制檢查範本中的內容，並擲回例外狀況，如果所需的控制項找不到，名稱不正確，或屬於錯誤的類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you use the content in the template and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> will throw an exception if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> or some other <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> control is not found for the user name.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您使用的樣板和集合中的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>屬性`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>將會擲回例外狀況，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>或其他一些<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>控制中找不到使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control style properties and describes which UI element they affect.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項樣式屬性，並描述它們會影響哪些 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the properties to which each style applies, see the individual style property.
trans-unit.target: 如需每個樣式套用至屬性的清單，請參閱個別的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> style property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: UI element
trans-unit.target: UI 項目

trans-unit.source: Cancel button on the Change Password view.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼 檢視上的 取消 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Change Password button on the Change Password view.
trans-unit.target: 在 [變更密碼] 檢視上變更密碼按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Continue button on the Success view.
trans-unit.target: 繼續按鈕上順利完成檢視表。

trans-unit.source: Error text displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 對使用者顯示錯誤文字。

trans-unit.source: Hyperlinks to other pages.
trans-unit.target: 其他網頁的超連結。

trans-unit.source: Instructional text on the page that describes how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何使用頁面上的指示文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 所有輸入的欄位，例如文字方塊的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Hints for providing an acceptable password for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 為網站提供可接受的密碼提示。

trans-unit.source: Text displayed to the user when the password has been successfully changed.
trans-unit.target: 已成功變更密碼時，對使用者顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Text entry input fields.
trans-unit.target: 文字項目輸入的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Titles for the Change Password and Success views.
trans-unit.target: [變更密碼] 和 [成功] 檢視的標題。

trans-unit.source: Applying CSS Styles
trans-unit.target: 套用 CSS 樣式

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項可讓您在標記中指定的 CSS 樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: If you use templates to customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用範本自訂外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項，您可以指定 CSS 樣式中的範本中的標記。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no extra outer table is required.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，額外外部資料表不是必要的。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.RenderOuterTable%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以防止資料表呈現的設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.RenderOuterTable%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Validation Groupings
trans-unit.target: 驗證群組

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control can be validated separately.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項使用的驗證群組，以便與相同的頁面上其他欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>個別驗證控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項當做驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control with the ID `"ChangePassword1"` will use a validation group name of `ChangePassword1` as well.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項具有 ID`"ChangePassword1"`將使用的驗證群組名稱`ChangePassword1`以及。

trans-unit.source: To set the validation group that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control is part of, you must create a template with the control, and then change the validation group name.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的驗證群組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項是的一部分，您必須使用控制項建立範本，然後變更 驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: To show error messages if a user leaves a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control empty, add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示錯誤訊息如果使用者離開<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制空，請新增<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控制項加入網頁。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Access Keys and Tab Indexes
trans-unit.target: 存取索引鍵和索引標籤索引

trans-unit.source: For information about how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init
trans-unit.target: 在 Page_Load 和 Page_Init 期間存取控制項

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A>，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。

trans-unit.source: In particular, during the Page_Init and Page_Load phases, these properties have the same value they had when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control was rendered.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，在 Page_Init 和 Page_Load 階段期間，這些屬性有相同的值，這些應用程式啟動時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the user changes the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> property by modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> text box, the new value will be available when the changed event is raised, which occurs after the Page_Load phase.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者變更的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>藉由修改屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> 文字方塊中，新值可變更的事件引發時，這在 Page_Load 階段之後發生。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> property in the Page_Init phase or Page_Load phase and provide a custom handler for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> event, any change that the user makes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> text box overrides the value set in the Page_Init or Page_Load phase.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>Page_Init 階段或 Page_Load 階段中的屬性，並提供的自訂處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>事件、 使用者讓快取中的任何變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>文字方塊中會覆寫在 Page_Init 中設定的值或Page_Load 階段。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>屬性來定義規則運算式，會檢查密碼，以確保它們符合下列準則：

trans-unit.source: Are greater than six characters.
trans-unit.target: 會大於 6 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one digit.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一個數字。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。

trans-unit.source: The password requirements contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A> property are displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的密碼需求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A>屬性會顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: If the password entered by the user does not meet the requirements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合需求的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>屬性、 文字中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>屬性顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果未輸入新密碼，文字會包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>屬性顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 新密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密碼不符合這些需求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>屬性來定義規則運算式，會檢查密碼，以確保它們符合下列準則：

trans-unit.source: Are greater than six characters.
trans-unit.target: 會大於 6 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one digit.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一個數字。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。

trans-unit.source: The password requirements contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A> property are displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的密碼需求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.PasswordHintText%2A>屬性會顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合準則，文字會包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>屬性顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果未輸入新密碼，文字會包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>屬性顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 新密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密碼不符合這些需求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of padding, in pixels, inside the border and the designated area for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定邊框和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項之指定區域間的邊框距離 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels of space between the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control's border.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項內容和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項邊框之間的間距像素數量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.BorderPadding%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.BorderPadding%2A>屬性儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.BorderPadding" /> property is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.BorderPadding" /> 屬性的值小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the Cancel button to cancel changing a password.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下 [取消] 按鈕取消變更密碼時。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="CommandName" /> value of the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 表示 [取消] 按鈕的 <see langword="CommandName" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonCommandName> field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonCommandName>欄位來表示`CommandName`取消按鈕的值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Cancel button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定模擬功能的 [取消] 按鈕的任何按鈕時這非常有用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To assign cancel functionality to any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of the button to the string that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonCommandName> field.
trans-unit.target: 若要指派給任何的 [取消] 5d; 功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>中所包含的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>到字串中包含按鈕的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonCommandName>欄位。

trans-unit.source: The Cancel button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template.
trans-unit.target: [取消] 按鈕可以出現在 ChangePassword 範本或成功範本。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Cancel button on the Success template will not undo the password change; it will clear the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下取消 5d; 按鈕成功範本並不會復原密碼變更。它將會清除文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: To add custom functionality to the Cancel button, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將自訂功能加入至 [取消] 按鈕，建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display with the Cancel button, if the Cancel button is configured by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonType" /> property to be an image button.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonType" /> 屬性將 [取消] 按鈕設定為影像按鈕，取得或設定隨 [取消] 按鈕一起顯示之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to display with the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 隨 [取消] 按鈕一起顯示之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> properties that define the appearance of the Cancel button on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 控制項上 [取消] 按鈕外觀之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 屬性集合的參考。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the appearance of the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件，定義 [取消] 按鈕的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting
trans-unit.target: 設定

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The color of the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 取消按鈕的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 色彩可以是任何一個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The color of the border around the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 取消 5d; 按鈕周圍框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 色彩可以是任何一個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style of the border around the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: [取消] 按鈕周圍的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.
trans-unit.target: 樣式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"NotSet"`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。

trans-unit.source: Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` setting is greater than 2.
trans-unit.target: 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`設定值大於 2。

trans-unit.source: The width of the border around the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 取消 5d; 按鈕周圍框線的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 用來呈現 [取消] 按鈕階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定其他設定，它們將會覆寫樣式表設定。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Cancel button text in bold type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以粗體類型顯示取消按鈕的文字。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Cancel button text in italic type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 以斜體字型顯示取消按鈕的文字。

trans-unit.source: The name of the font face.
trans-unit.target: 字體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Cancel button text with a line above it.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要顯示取消 5d; 按鈕文字上方的第一行。

trans-unit.source: The size of the text in the Cancel button as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.
trans-unit.target: 做為 [取消] 按鈕的文字大小<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>物件。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Cancel button text as crossed out.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要顯示取消 5d; 按鈕文字線。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Cancel button text with an underline.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要顯示取消 5d; 按鈕文字與底線。

trans-unit.source: The color of the text in the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: [取消] 按鈕的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 色彩可以是任何一個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed on the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示於 [取消] 按鈕上的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在 [取消] 按鈕上的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Cancel".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 "Cancel"。

trans-unit.source: The default for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonText%2A> property is "Cancel".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonText%2A>屬性為"Cancel"。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button to use for the Cancel button when rendering the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項時，[取消] 按鈕要使用的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> object that defines the type of button to render for the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 物件，定義 [取消] 按鈕的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: The property value can be one of the three <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> enumeration values: <see langword="Button" />, <see langword="Image" />, or <see langword="Link" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值可以是三個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 列舉型別值的其中一個︰<see langword="Button" />、<see langword="Image" /> 或 <see langword="Link" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Button" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonType%2A> property gets or sets the type (`Button`, `Image`, or `Link)` of Cancel button to use when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CancelButtonType%2A>屬性會取得或設定型別 (`Button`， `Image`，或`Link)`呈現時要使用 [取消] 按鈕的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page that the user is shown after clicking the Cancel button in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項中的 [取消] 按鈕後，向使用者顯示之網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the page the user is redirected to after clicking the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [取消] 按鈕後，重新導向使用者到達的網頁 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the password is changed for a user account.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者帳戶的密碼變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword> event is raised after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword>中指定的成員資格提供者來變更密碼之後，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword> event is raised, the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword>引發事件時，會發生下列情況：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control attempts to send an email message to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項嘗試傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property or the control template specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可能是重新導向至指定的網站<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessPageUrl%2A>屬性或控制項樣板中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: The new authorization token for the user is set after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 新的授權權杖的使用者設定後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="CommandName" /> value of the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 表示 [變更密碼] 按鈕的 <see langword="CommandName" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonCommandName> field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonCommandName>欄位來表示`CommandName`變更密碼按鈕的值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Change Password button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定模擬功能的變更密碼按鈕的任何按鈕時這非常有用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The Change Password button completes the last step in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼按鈕完成的最後一個步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To assign change-password functionality to any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of the button to the string that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonCommandName> field.
trans-unit.target: 若要將變更密碼功能指派給任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>中所包含的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>到字串中包含按鈕的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonCommandName>欄位。

trans-unit.source: The Change Password button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼按鈕可以出現在 ChangePassword 範本或成功範本。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, clicking the Change Password button calls the membership provider to change the password.
trans-unit.target: 在這兩種情況下，按一下 變更密碼按鈕呼叫來變更密碼的成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: To add custom functionality to the Change Password button, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入自訂功能來變更密碼 按鈕，建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image displayed next to the Change Password button on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control if the Change Password button is configured by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonType" /> property to be an image button.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 屬性將 [變更密碼] 按鈕設定為影像按鈕，取得或設定顯示在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonType" /> 控制項 [變更密碼] 按鈕旁之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to display next to the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在 [變更密碼] 按鈕旁之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> properties that define the appearance of the Change Password button on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 控制項上 [變更密碼] 按鈕外觀之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 屬性集合的參考。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the appearance of the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件，定義 [變更密碼] 按鈕的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting
trans-unit.target: 設定

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The color of the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼按鈕的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 色彩可以是任何一個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The color of the border around the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼按鈕周圍的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 色彩可以是任何一個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style of the border around the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼按鈕周圍的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.
trans-unit.target: 樣式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"NotSet"`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。

trans-unit.source: Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.
trans-unit.target: 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。

trans-unit.source: The width of the border around the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼按鈕周圍的框線寬度。

trans-unit.source: The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 用來呈現的變更密碼按鈕階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定其他設定，它們將會覆寫樣式表設定。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Change Password button text in bold type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要以粗體類型顯示 變更密碼按鈕文字。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Change Password button text in italic type.
trans-unit.target: `true` 以斜體字型顯示 變更密碼按鈕文字。

trans-unit.source: The name of the font face.
trans-unit.target: 字體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Change Password button text with a line above it.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要顯示 變更密碼按鈕文字的第一行上面。

trans-unit.source: The size of the text in the Change Password button as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼按鈕的文字大小<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>物件。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Change Password button text as crossed out.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要顯示 變更密碼按鈕文字線。

trans-unit.source: `true` to display the Change Password button text with an underline.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要顯示 變更密碼按鈕文字與底線。

trans-unit.source: The color of the text in the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 中的變更密碼按鈕的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.
trans-unit.target: 色彩可以是任何一個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the height of the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示變更密碼按鈕的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the width of the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示變更密碼按鈕的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed on the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示於 [變更密碼] 按鈕上的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在 [變更密碼] 按鈕上的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Change Password".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [變更密碼]。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button to use when rendering the Change Password button of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項的 [變更密碼] 按鈕時要使用的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> object that defines the type of button to render for the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 物件，定義 [變更密碼] 按鈕的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: The property value can be one of the three <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> enumeration values: <see langword="Button" />, <see langword="Image" />, or <see langword="Link" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值可以是三個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 列舉型別值的其中一個︰<see langword="Button" />、<see langword="Image" /> 或 <see langword="Link" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Button" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonType%2A> property gets or sets the type (`Button`, `Image`, or `Link)` of the Change Password button to use when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordButtonType%2A>屬性會取得或設定型別 (`Button`， `Image`，或`Link)`呈現時要使用 [變更密碼] 按鈕的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is an error changing the password for the user account.
trans-unit.target: 發生於變更使用者帳戶密碼遭遇錯誤時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised when the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property encounters an error while attempting to change the password for a user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>中指定的成員資格提供者時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性嘗試變更使用者帳戶的密碼時若發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the user enters an incorrect current password or an invalid new password.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者輸入的目前密碼不正確或無效的新密碼，這可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object does not indicate the reason why changing the password failed, only that the password was not changed.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>物件並不表示密碼變更失敗的原因，只的原因，無法變更密碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event to perform custom actions when the password is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>密碼未變更時執行自訂動作的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message that is shown when the user's password is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當使用者密碼未變更時要顯示的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The error message to display when the attempt to change the user's password is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 當變更使用者密碼的嘗試失敗時，顯示的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your attempt to change passwords was unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 密碼變更嘗試未成功。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 請重試。」

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordFailureText%2A> property is displayed when the membership provider rejects the password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordFailureText%2A>成員資格提供者會拒絕使用者所輸入的密碼時，會顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object does not return a reason for rejecting the new password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>物件不會傳回有理由要拒絕新的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event to examine the rejected password if you want to provide the user with a tip on how to enter an acceptable password (for example, to indicate that a strong password must be provided).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>事件，以檢查已拒絕的密碼，如果您想要提供有關如何輸入 （例如，表示，必須提供強式密碼） 的可接受密碼的提示使用者。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> object used to display the Change Password view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 控制項之 [變更密碼] 檢視的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> object that contains the template for displaying the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control in the Change Password view.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 物件，包含用來在 [變更密碼] 檢視中顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A> property specifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A>屬性會指定<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>所使用物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How To： 建立 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項範本動態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。

trans-unit.source: A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control.
trans-unit.target: 範本是 HTML 項目和控制項的版面配置控制項的特定部分所組成的一組。

trans-unit.source: Templates differ from styles:
trans-unit.target: 範本的樣式有所不同：

trans-unit.source: Templates define the content of a section of a control.
trans-unit.target: 範本定義控制項的區段的內容。

trans-unit.source: Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式會指定在控制項中項目的外觀。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 伺服器控制項樣板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the templates and the corresponding control view that are supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出範本和對應的控制項檢視所支援的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Template name
trans-unit.target: 範本名稱

trans-unit.source: Control view
trans-unit.target: 控制項檢視

trans-unit.source: Change Password
trans-unit.target: 變更密碼

trans-unit.source: Success
trans-unit.target: 成功

trans-unit.source: You can also create or modify the template for a control in your .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立或修改在.aspx 檔案的控制項範本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create ASP.NET Web Control Templates Declaratively](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a) and [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立 ASP.NET Web 控制項範本以宣告方式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a)和[How To： 建立 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項範本動態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。

trans-unit.source: The procedures in those topics do not require you to configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這些主題中的程序不需要您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do configure the template, the following table lists the required and optional controls for the template.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定範本下, 表列出必要和選擇性的控制項範本。

trans-unit.source: Control ID
trans-unit.target: 控制項 ID

trans-unit.source: Control type
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型

trans-unit.source: Required/optional
trans-unit.target: 必要/選用

trans-unit.source: Any control that causes event bubbling (passing the event up the server control hierarchy), such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 任何控制項之事件反昇 （傳遞伺服器控制項階層架構事件），例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The button command name must be set to the control ID.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕名稱必須設定為控制項 id。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any control that causes event bubbling (passing the event up the server control hierarchy), such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 任何控制項之事件反昇 （傳遞伺服器控制項階層架構事件），例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The button command name must be set to the control ID.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕名稱必須設定為控制項 id。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any type that supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 支援任何型別<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>介面，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any control that causes event bubbling (passing the event up the server control hierarchy), such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 任何控制項之事件反昇 （傳遞伺服器控制項階層架構事件），例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The button command name must be set to the control ID.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕名稱必須設定為控制項 id。

trans-unit.source: This control appears on the Success template.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項出現在 [成功] 範本。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any type that supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 支援任何型別<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>介面，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必要

trans-unit.source: Any type that supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 支援任何型別<xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>介面。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any type that supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 支援任何型別<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>介面，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必要

trans-unit.source: Any type that supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 支援任何型別<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>介面。

trans-unit.source: Required if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Must be absent if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若必須<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception if the template does not contain the required controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制會擲回<xref:System.Web.HttpException>例外狀況，如果範本不包含必要的控制項。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供的選擇性控制識別碼至錯誤的類型; 的控制項，會擲不回任何例外狀況不過，如果控制項之後忽略由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control uses to create an instance of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> template.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項用來建立 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" /> 樣板執行個體的容器。

trans-unit.source: This provides programmatic access to child controls.
trans-unit.target: 此提供以程式設計方式存取子控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> that contains a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />，其包含 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed at the top of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control in Change Password view.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [變更密碼] 檢視中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項上方的顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to display at the top of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> 控制項上方顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Change Your Password".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [變更您的密碼]。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the password for a user account is changed by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 發生於成員資格提供者變更使用者帳戶密碼之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event is raised before the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property is called to change the password for a user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>之前在指定的成員資格提供者引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性呼叫來變更使用者帳戶的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件執行之前變更密碼，例如檢查新的密碼，以確定其所需的任何處理就不會在清單中的一般密碼。

trans-unit.source: The new authorization token for the user is set after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 新的授權權杖的使用者設定後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs> object to `true` if the event handler determines that the membership provider should not be called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>設定也可以取消事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs>物件`true`如果事件處理常式可讓您決定不應該呼叫成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, and includes a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event named `ChangingPassword`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項，並包含的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件名為`ChangingPassword`。

trans-unit.source: The code in the event handler compares the old password stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A> property to the new password stored in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式中的程式碼會比較儲存在舊密碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.CurrentPassword%2A>屬性為新的密碼儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPassword%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果是相同的兩個密碼，密碼變更失敗。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>屬性`true`，讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page.
trans-unit.target: 這表示使用者沒有登入以檢視頁面。

trans-unit.source: The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知名稱和密碼的使用者。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the duplicate password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者輸入的重複密碼。

trans-unit.source: The duplicate new password string entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入的重複新密碼字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword%2A> property contains the duplicate new password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword%2A>屬性包含重複的使用者所輸入的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define the requirements for the new password.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>屬性來定義新的密碼需求。

trans-unit.source: This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side.
trans-unit.target: 這個規則運算式用來強制執行用戶端上的密碼規則。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level and enforced on the server side.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>與可以在資料存放區層級設定和伺服器端上強制執行密碼強化不相關。

trans-unit.source: The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密碼不符合這些需求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users.
trans-unit.target: 可以檢視或遭惡意使用者 HTTP 傳輸。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when using login controls, you should use the HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback.
trans-unit.target: 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the label text for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword" /> text box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword" /> 文字方塊的標籤文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to display with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword" /> text box.
trans-unit.target: 隨 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword" /> 文字方塊顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Confirm New Password:".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [確認新密碼:]。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message that is displayed when the new password and the duplicate password entered by the user are not identical.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當使用者輸入的新密碼和重複密碼不相同時所顯示的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the new password and confirmed password are not identical.
trans-unit.target: 新密碼和確認密碼不相同時顯示的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "The confirm New Password entry must match the New Password entry."
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 [確認新密碼項目必須與新密碼項目符合]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control requires the user to enter the new password twice because the password characters are masked on the screen as the user types them.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項需要使用者輸入新密碼兩次因為密碼字元都會加上遮罩螢幕上為使用者輸入它們。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not enter the same password in both the New Password text box and the Confirm New Password text box, the message in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmPasswordCompareErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者未輸入相同的密碼中新的密碼 文字方塊中，確認新密碼文字方塊中，在訊息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmPasswordCompareErrorMessage%2A>顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed when the Confirm New Password text box is left empty.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定錯誤訊息，其顯示於 [確認新密碼] 文字方塊保留為空白時。

trans-unit.source: The error message that is displayed when users attempt to change their password without entering the new password in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword" /> input box.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者嘗試變更密碼，而未在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword" /> 輸入方塊中輸入新密碼時，顯示的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonClick" /> event when the user clicks the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 [取消] 按鈕時，引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonClick" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Represents <see langword="CommandName" /> value of the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 表示 [繼續] 按鈕的 <see langword="CommandName" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonCommandName> field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonCommandName>欄位來表示`CommandName`繼續按鈕的值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Continue button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定模擬功能的 [繼續] 按鈕的任何按鈕時這非常有用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To assign continue functionality to any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of the button to the string that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonCommandName> field.
trans-unit.target: 若要指派繼續任何功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>中所包含的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>到字串中包含按鈕的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonCommandName>欄位。

trans-unit.source: The Continue button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template.
trans-unit.target: 繼續按鈕可以出現在 ChangePassword 範本或成功範本。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Continue button redirects the user to the URL stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [繼續] 按鈕將使用者導向至儲存在 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To add custom functionality to the Continue button, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將自訂功能加入至 [繼續] 按鈕，建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to use for the Continue button on the Success view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword" /> control if the Continue button is configured by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonType" /> property to be an image button.
